name: Shape Wars (TejasvOnly)
description:
An Arcade game where you have to build an unstable tower to get as high as you can.

Controls  A/D : Move the player Space : Jump Mouse : Aim the Gun Mouse 1 : Shoot Mouse 2 : Build

Kill enemies to get blocks(to build) and hp.

Go as high as you can by building a tower.

Difficulty increases with height.

I forget to mention this in the game but you can wall jump and wall slide too!

Made for Ludum Dare 49 in 48 hours.
